activities.name: Get Mouse Co√∂rdinates
activities.info: Displays message box with absolute coordinates of the mouse position

activities.name: Click on Position
activities.info: Clicks on a specific (x,y) pixel coordinate on the screen.

activities.name: Double Click on Position
activities.info: Double clicks on a specific (x,y) pixel coordinate on the screen.

activities.name: Right Click on Position
activities.info: Right clicks on a specific (x,y) pixel coordinate on the screen.

activities.name: Move To Position
activities.info: Moves te pointer to a x-y pixel position.

activities.name: Move Relative
activities.info: Moves the mouse an x- and y- distance relative to its current pixel position.

activities.name: Drag
activities.info: Drag the mouse from its current position to a entered x-y position, while holding a specified button.

activities.name: Click on Image
activities.info: Clicks on an image on the screen. Image path needs to be specified.

activities.name: Press Key
activities.info: Press and release a specific key.

activities.name: Hotkey
activities.info: Press a hotkey (combination)

activities.name: Type Text
activities.info: Types text with a specified interval in seconds

activities.name: Press Caps Lock
activities.info: Press the Caps Lock key.

activities.name: Press Num Lock
activities.info: Press the Num Lock key.

activities.name: Press Enter
activities.info: Press the Enter key.

activities.name: Press Space Bar
activities.info: Press the Space bar key.

activities.name: Press Backspace
activities.info: Press the Backspace key.

activities.name: Press Delete
activities.info: Press the delete key.

activities.name: Press End
activities.info: Press the End key.

activities.name: Press Tab
activities.info: Press the Tab key.

activities.name: Create Unique Key
activities.info: Returns a UUID as a string with. "Length" determines the amount of characters returned.

activities.name: Wait
activities.info: Wait for a specified time in seconds

activities.name: Wait for Image
activities.info: Wait for an image to appear on the screen. Image path needs to be specified

activities.name: Open Chrome browser
activities.info: Opens the Chrome browser

activities.name: Browse to URL
activities.info: Browse to a specific URL. Browser needs to be opened first

activities.name: Launch Process
activities.info: Launches a process based on the executable

activities.name: Kill Process
activities.info: Kills a process

activities.name: For Loop
activities.info: Perform a for-looping operation

activities.name: Condition
activities.info: If a condition is true, run the indented code

activities.name: User input message box
activities.info: Shows a pop-up message asking for user for input

activities.name: Display Info Box
activities.info: Shows an info pop-up message with title and body

activities.name: Display Warning Box
activities.info: Shows a warning pop-up message with title and body

activities.name: Display Error Box
activities.info: Shows an error pop-up message with title and body

activities.name: Read Cell from Excel (by row and col)
activities.info: Read cell value from Excel by row and col: first row is defined row number 1 and first column is defined column number 1

activities.name: Read Cell from Excel (by cell name)
activities.info: Read cell value from Excel by cell name e.g. cell="A2" is the first cell

activities.name: Write Cell to Excel (by row and col)
activities.info: Write value to Excel by row and col: first row is defined row number 1 and first column is defined column number 1

activities.name: Write Cell to Excel (by cell name)
activities.info: Write cell value from Excel by cell name e.g. cell="A2" is the first cell

activities.name: Open Word Document
activities.info: Open a Word document by referring to the absolute path

activities.name: Replace Text
activities.info: Replaces text in a Word document, for example to fill in certain fields in a form

activities.name: Convert Word to PDF
activities.info: Transforms a Word document to PDF

activities.name: Open File
activities.info: Opens a file at the given path

activities.name: Rename File
activities.info: Changes the name of a file located by a specified path to new_name

activities.name: Remove File
activities.info: Removes the file with a specified pathname.

activities.name: Move File
activities.info: Moves a file with a specified path to a new location.

activities.name: File Exists
activities.info: Checks whether a file with the given path exists.

activities.name: Copy File
activities.info: Copies a file from a location specified by old_path to a new location.

activities.name: Wait For File
activities.info: Waits for a file to be created and then opens it.

activities.name: Make New Folder
activities.info: Creates new folder at the given path

activities.name: Open Folder
activities.info: Opens a folder at the given path

activities.name: Rename Folder
activities.info: Changes the name of a folder located by a specified path to new_name

activities.name: Remove Folder
activities.info: Removes the folder with all its contents from a specified pathname.

activities.name: Move Folder
activities.info: Moves a folder from one specified path to a new path.

activities.name: Empty Folder
activities.info: Removes all the folders and files from a given directory.

activities.name: Folder Exists
activities.info: Checks whether the folder with a given path exists.

activities.name: Copy Folder
activities.info: Copies a folder located by old pathname to a new location specified by new pathname.

activities.name: Zip Folder
activities.info: Zips a folder specified by folder_path.

activities.name: UnZip Folder
activities.info: Zips a folder specified by path and stores it at new_path.

activities.name: Wait For Folder
activities.info: Waits for a folder to be created and then opens it.

activities.name: Open Image
activities.info: Opens an image with the given path.

activities.name: Rotate Image
activities.info: Rotate an image over a specified angle.

activities.name: Resize Image
activities.info: Resizes an image. The new size is entered with a tuple of the form: (width, height)

activities.name: Image Size
activities.info: Returns the pixel-size of an entered image in a message box.

activities.name: Crop Image
activities.info: Crops an image to a region specified by the box argument.

activities.name: Mirror Image Left To Right
activities.info: Mirrors an image with a given path horizontally.

activities.name: Mirror Image Vertically
activities.info: Mirrors an image with a given path vertically.

activities.name: Image Format
activities.info: Returns a message box specifying the format of an image.

activities.name: Open Calculator
activities.info: Open Windows Calculator.

activities.name: Open Paint
activities.info: Open MS Paint.

activities.name: Open Notepad
activities.info: Open Windows Notepad.

activities.name: Open Snipping Tool
activities.info: Open Windows Snipping Tool.

activities.name: Open Control Panel
activities.info: Open Windows Control Panel.

activities.name: Open Clean Manager
activities.info: Open Windows Clean Manager.

activities.name: Open Dialer
activities.info: Open Windows Dialer.

activities.name: Open Volume Mixer
activities.info: Open Windows Volume Mixer.

activities.name: Open XPS Viewer
activities.info: Open Windows XPS Viewer.

activities.name: Absolute
activities.info: Calculates the absolute value of an integer or float

activities.name: Ceiling
activities.info: Rounds up an integer or float to the closest number

activities.name: Exponential
activities.info: The exponential of x

activities.name: Floor
activities.info: The floor of x: the largest integer not greater than x

activities.name: Log
activities.info: The natural logarithm of x, for x> 0

activities.name: Maximum
activities.info: The largest of its arguments: the value closest to positive infinity

activities.name: Minimum
activities.info: The smallest of its arguments: the value closest to negative infinity

activities.name: Round
activities.info: x rounded to n digits from the decimal point.

activities.name: Absolute
activities.info: Calculates the absolute value of an integer or float

activities.name: Square root
activities.info: The square root of x for x > 0
